service.name: react-component-library
service.description: AI-powered React component library with accessibility testing, performance benchmarking, and live component playground

api.description: Component library API port for component CRUD and testing

ui.description: Component showcase and playground UI port

health.description: React Component Library health check configuration

steps.name: verify-structure
steps.run: echo '📁 Verifying React Component Library structure...' && ls -la

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && echo '🔨 Building Go API...' && go mod download && go build -o react-component-library-api .
steps.description: Build Go API server for component management

steps.name: install-ui-deps
steps.run: cd ui && echo '📦 Installing UI dependencies with pnpm...' && pnpm install --filter .

steps.name: build-ui
steps.run: cd ui && echo '⚛️ Building React UI...' && npm run build

steps.name: install-cli
steps.run: cd cli && echo '🔧 Installing CLI...' && ./install.sh

steps.name: setup-database
steps.run: echo '🗃️ Setting up PostgreSQL schema...' && resource-postgres content execute "$(cat initialization/storage/postgres/schema.sql)"
steps.description: Initialize PostgreSQL schema for component storage

steps.name: setup-n8n-workflows
steps.run: echo '🔄 Registering n8n workflows...' && ls initialization/automation/n8n/
steps.description: Verify n8n workflow files are present

steps.name: verify-resources
steps.run: echo '✅ Verifying resource connections...' && resource-postgres status && resource-qdrant status && resource-minio status
steps.description: Verify all required resources are accessible

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run: echo '🚀 React Component Library setup complete!' && echo '  📚 Component Library: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}' && echo '  🔌 API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}' && echo '  💻 CLI: react-component-library --help'

develop.description: Start React Component Library with production UI bundle

steps.name: start-api
steps.run: cd api && ./react-component-library-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && echo '⚛️ Starting React UI server...' && API_URL=http://localhost:${API_PORT} node scripts/update-health.js && node server.js
steps.description: Start Express server with built React app

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run: echo "API: http://localhost:$API_PORT" && echo "UI: http://localhost:$UI_PORT"

run.description: Start React Component Library in production mode

steps.name: start-api
steps.run: cd api && echo '🚀 Starting API server (production)...' && ./react-component-library-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in production mode

steps.name: serve-ui
steps.run: cd ui && echo '🌐 Serving built UI...' && API_URL=http://localhost:${API_PORT} node scripts/update-health.js && npx serve -s dist -l ${UI_PORT}

steps.name: show-status
steps.run: sleep 3 && echo '✅ React Component Library is running in production!' && echo '  📚 Component Library: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}' && echo '  🔌 API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}'

steps.name: test-api
steps.run: cd api && echo '🧪 Testing Go API...' && go test ./... -v

steps.name: test-ui
steps.run: cd ui && echo '⚛️ Testing React UI...' && npm test -- --watchAll=false --coverage

steps.name: test-cli
steps.run: cd cli && echo '💻 Testing CLI...' && ./test.sh

steps.name: test-integration
steps.run: echo '🔗 Testing integration...' && ./test.sh --integration
steps.description: Run integration tests with all components

steps.name: test-accessibility
steps.run: echo '♿ Testing accessibility...' && react-component-library test --accessibility --all
steps.description: Run accessibility tests on all components

shutdown.description: Gracefully stop React Component Library services

steps.name: stop-services
steps.run: echo '🛑 Stopping React Component Library services...' && pkill -f react-component-library-api || true && pkill -f 'npm start' || true && pkill -f 'serve.*build' || true

steps.name: cleanup-temp
steps.run: echo '🧹 Cleaning up temporary files...' && rm -rf /tmp/component-* 2>/dev/null || true

stop.description: Force stop React Component Library services

steps.name: stop-api
steps.run: pkill -f "react-component-library-api" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "react-component-library-api" 2>/dev/null || true

steps.name: stop-ui
steps.run: pkill -f "scenarios/react-component-library.*server\.js" || true; pkill -f "scenarios/react-component-library.*serve" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "scenarios/react-component-library" 2>/dev/null || true

postgres.description: Component metadata, versions, test results, and usage analytics storage

qdrant.description: Semantic search for component patterns, documentation, and code similarity

claude-code.description: AI-powered component generation, improvement suggestions, and code analysis

minio.description: Storage for component screenshots, exported packages, and static assets

redis.description: Caching for component metadata and search results (performance optimization)

browserless.description: Automated screenshot generation for visual regression testing
